Pages.Text: You can choose to auto-target an enemy and to auto-repeat your attacks, but you still must click on low, medium or high once for any new opponent.  More tips: To hit a rat, you must target LOW.  To hit a phyntos wasp, try HIGH.  A monster's health is displayed below its name in the bottom-right corner of the screen. For more information, click on the magnifying glass icon while you have the monster selected.  Finally, don't forget to double-click on the corpse to see if it contains any goodies!
